articles.description: Luke Littler was throwing darts while still in his nappy. On Friday, the teenager could take the final step of a journey that began almost as soon as he could walk.
articles.title: Luke Littler: PDC World Championship final and immortality beckon for teenager

articles.description: All the latest football team news, transfers, manager news conferences and build-up as Manchester United go to leaders Liverpool on Sunday.
articles.title: Football and transfers latest: Premier League news conferences, team news and build-up

articles.description: Australia dismiss India for 185 on day one of their series decider but a fired-up Jasprit Bumrah strikes with the final ball of the day to boost the tourists late on.
articles.title: Australia v India: Jasprit Bumrah strikes late but hosts on top in Sydney

articles.description: Rangers condemn "in the strongest possible terms" an incident in which Celtic's Arne Engels was struck by a coin during Thursday's Old Firm game.
articles.title: Rangers 3-0 Celtic: Ibrox club condemn incident in which Engels hit by coin

articles.description: A huge NFC showdown in Detroit, Lamar Jackson's final MVP audition and a three-way wildcard battle highlight the final weekend of NFL regular-season games.
articles.title: NFL Week 18 preview: Play-off pemutations, MVP watch, Mahomes and Barkley to miss out

articles.description: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti responds to the rumours that the club will make a bid for Liverpool's Trent Alexander-Arnold in the January transfer window.
articles.title: Trent Alexander-Arnold: Carlo Ancelotti responds to Real Madrid bid rumours

articles.description: When Brazilian tennis player Joao Lucas Reis da Silva posted a loving birthday message to his boyfriend on Instagram, he did not expect the attention which followed.
articles.title: Joao Lucas Reis da Silva: How Instagram post led to the ATP Tour's first openly gay active player

articles.description: Teenager Luke Littler thrashes Stephen Bunting 6-1 with a ruthless display to set up a PDC World Championship final against Michael van Gerwen on Friday.
articles.title: Luke Littler to face Michael van Gerwen in PDC World Darts Championship final

articles.description: Bristol Bears forward Abbie Ward is full of optimism for 2025 and hopes England can create a legacy by winning the World Cup on home soil.
articles.title: Premiership Women's Rugby: Abbie Ward wants Red Roses to emulate Lionesses in 2025

articles.description: Stephen Curry sets a new three-pointer record as the Golden State Warriors defeat the Philadelphia 76ers 139-105 in the NBA.
articles.title: NBA: Stephen Curry makes history as Golden State Warriors rout Philadelphia 76ers
